casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Donnell ALEXANDER. No. 622A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2005. Kelly D. Miller, Assistant Appellate Defender, for James Alexander. Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

*554The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of January 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 17th day of February 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of January 2005."
